name: Rolling Red Ball Rush Up Sky
name_original: Rolling Red Ball Rush Up Sky
description:
How higher can you reach?
It’s an exciting one touch addiction and a pure, genius, minimal arcade game about risk, reflex and control.

Gameplay:
• Endless vertical avoidance game play
• Complete tapping challenge
• Avoid dangerous spikes obstacles
• Reach new heights

Having problems or want to leave us some feedback? We would love to hear from you!
